# maximumBatteryCapacity

**Instance Property**

A user-facing value that represents the maximum battery capacity of the electric vehicle.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumBatteryCapacity: Measurement<UnitEnergy>? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value the system displays to the user as 100% battery charge. It can never be less than that of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntentResponse/currentBatteryCapacity].

## Providing Battery Capacity

- **minimumBatteryCapacity**: A user-facing value that represents the minimum battery capacity of the electric vehicle.
- **currentBatteryCapacity**: A user-facing value that represents the current battery capacity of the electric vehicle.
